function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased neighbour noise during lockdown due to more people staying and working from home.","Impact":"Increased annoyance, decreased quality of life, potential health effects from prolonged exposure to noise.","Mitigation":"Improve sound insulation, establish quiet hours, promote respectful neighbor behavior.","Technologies":"Soundproofing materials, noise-canceling devices, smart home technology for noise monitoring.","People":"Residents, especially those living in flats or apartments.","Owner":"Landlords, property managers, local authorities."}]}
